com.zebra.rfid.api3

Class Readers

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • com.zebra.rfid.api3.Readers

  • public class Readers
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver
    This class contains the management of Readers as bluetooth device. Handles the attach/detach, pair/unpair, paired list and detection of readers

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Readers.RFIDReaderEventHandler
      Interface to be implemented by fragments to be notified when a new device is discovered via bluetooth

        android.content.BroadcastReceiver.PendingResult
